title: (x) Need to emulate a hand written style script - various {gang}
content:
Hi everyone

Is there any one who knows of a similar hand written font to this piece of writing I need to emmulate.

Thanks

Alec

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [quote.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080312104639/http:/typophile.com/files/quote.jpg) | 61.44 KB |

 [‹ (x) type on Kodak film negative - Copperplate Gothic, Helvetica {Yves}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080312104639/http:/typophile.com/node/14391 "Go to previous forum topic") [Type on Barcelona soccer jerseys ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080312104639/http:/typophile.com/node/14367 "Go to next forum topic")
author: alecchin

comments.content: I think you can try with [Amienne](http://web.archive.org/web/20080312104639/http:/www.typodermic.com/fonts/28.html) but surely you can get good results lettering. bye.

I’d suggest looking at fonts by [Typadelic](http://web.archive.org/web/20080312104639/http:/www.myfonts.com/foundry/typadelic/), [E-phemera](http://web.archive.org/web/20080312104639/http:/www.myfonts.com/foundry/ephemera/) and [TypeSETit](http://web.archive.org/web/20080312104639/http:/www.myfonts.com/foundry/gideon/).
